title: Tully Bracelet (Vermeil)
description: A delicate gold bracelet adorned with a trio of gems. This simple style is just what you need to add a touch of luxe to your everyday look. Shown here with the Meja Pendant and Demi Studs. Vermeil Collection. This demi-fine jewelry collection features styles crafted with a thick layer of 18K gold on sterling silver, and set with Moissanite, diamond-like stones. 18K gold has a warmer, golden-yellow hue compared to 14K.
